name: AM PM
survey_intro: Hello, I'm conducting a survey and would like to include you.
company_intro: from Communicus, a consumer opinion firm.

questions.question: What is your regular brand of cigarettes, that is, the one brand you smoke most often?
questions.instruction: PROBE FOR SPECIFIC STYLE. REFER TO LIST OF BRANDS.

questions.question: Which of the following statements apply to you?
options: I eat dinner in a restaurant at least once a month.
I do most of the food shopping for myself and/or my family.
I have taken an airline trip on a scheduled commercial airline in the past 12 months.
